EmailTemplate.name: TADQF Dep Date Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Departure Date has now been changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Order_Communication_POE__c.ordexp_Purchaser_First_Name__c},
Your request for Departure Date change has now been taken care of. We will get back to you shortly.
We're here to help you. If you have any questions, please visit our Support Page. Or call us on 1300 861 736.
Regards, The TripADeal Team
